scripts.ember: run(){ npm run emberCheck $1 2>/dev/null && npm run emberActuate $1 || echo 'failed'; }; run
scripts.prompt: echo 'no arg passed ðŸ™‚,'; echo 'exiting: please provide a file name';
scripts.prompt2: echo 'ember-cli node_module does not exist ðŸ™‚,'; echo 'please use `npm install ember-cli --save-dev`';
scripts.emberCheck: run(){ npm run fileName $1 2>/dev/null && npm run emberInstalled $1 2>/dev/null ;}; run
scripts.fileName: fileName(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run prompt; return 1; fi; }; fileName
scripts.emberInstalled: emberInstalled(){ if [ -d node_modules/ember-cli ]; then npm run fixEmber; else npm run prompt2; return 1; fi; }; emberInstalled
scripts.fixEmber: cat package.json | grep -v 'ember-cli":' > temp.json; mv temp.json package.json
scripts.emberActuate: run(){ if [ ! -d $1 ]; then ember new  $1; fi; cd $1; ember serve; }; run
